other_tests.findings: BMD increased from 0.933 g/cm² at baseline (phase 1) to 1.051 g/cm² and 1.173 g/cm² after 4 and 7 months of transdermal estradiol treatment, respectively. Maximum BMD reached 1.275 g/cm² in phase 3.
other_tests.changes_over_time: BMD decreased to 1.180 g/cm² after 20 months and further decreased to 1.029 g/cm² after 24 months of treatment.

other_tests.findings: Bilateral necrosis of femoral heads was detected and no modifications were recorded thereafter.
